name: Rommel's Dark Blue Userstyles.org
description:
Code structure based on style 700 by user 467

The background color is #253960 with a gradient image at the top from the style 843
Links are color coded based on ranking:
Green=Good rank
Yellow=Medium rank
Orange=Poor rank
Red=Unranked

Other link color meanings:
Blue=Visited
Light blue=Not visited
White=Hover

If you notice anything strange please let me know so I can fix it.
